subpanels.description: Measurements and ratios to classify lateral sinus morphology (LS° = lateral sinus angle, LSp = lateral sinus position, LSd = lateral sinus depth).
Classification of lateral sinus angles; grey area represents angles documented in Paratethyan Turritellidae.
Notation system for describing spiral cords in turritellids: A, B, C, d = primary spiral cords, r, s, t, u = secondary spiral cords (adopted from Allmon 1996).
